metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3793 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An improper authorization issue in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from14.4 prior to 15.3.5, 15.4 prior to 15.4.4, and 15.5 prior to 15.5.2 allowsan attacker to read variables set directly in a GitLab CI/CD configurationfile they don't have access to.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
